author: gcolvin
content:
Multiple code sections and corresponding type sections to define their entry points are introduced for EOF-formatted ([EIP-3540](./eip-3540.md)) bytecode.  Each type_section/code section pair speficies a module with one or more procedural entry points.  Two new opcodes,`CALLPROC` and `RETPROC`, are introduced to call and return from such a procedure.
https://hackmd.io/XdxW4ssGQOmQHhArHd7pkA?view
